COPP_TRAP_WITH_EXIST_GROUP.desc: Configure COPP_TRAP with group in COPP_GROUP table.

COPP_TRAP_WITH_NON_EXIST_GROUP.desc: Configure COPP_TRAP with group which does not exist in COPP_GROUP table.

COPP_GROUP_PIR_LESS_THAN_CIR.desc: Configure COPP_GROUP with PIR less than CIR.
eStr: pir must be greater than or equal to cir

COPP_GROUP_WHEN_SRTCM_WITH_PIR.desc: Configure COPP_GROUP with srtcm and pir.
